scripts.wasm-pack:web: export RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" && wasm-pack build --release --out-dir dist/web/pkg && wasm-opt -Oz -o dist/web/pkg/pixelmatch_simd_wasm_bg.wasm dist/web/pkg/pixelmatch_simd_wasm_bg.wasm
scripts.wasm-pack:node: export RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" && wasm-pack build --release --out-dir dist/node/pkg --target nodejs && wasm-opt -Oz -o dist/node/pkg/pixelmatch_simd_wasm_bg.wasm dist/node/pkg/pixelmatch_simd_wasm_bg.wasm
